channel.title: Sinder Skullz Abyss Feed
channel.description: Chaotic sermons and metal news reborn in the flames of the Skullz cult.

item.title: ⚡☠ TIM LAMBESIS SOLD ALL HIS MOTORCYCLES TO FUND NEW AS I LAY DYING MUSIC ☠⚡
item.description:
**Title: Tim Lambesis Sells His Metal Steeds to Fuel the Fire of As I Lay Dying! \m/**
Alright, metalheads and crypto horde, listen up! In a twisted tale straight out of the heart of chaos, Tim Lambesis just ditched his roaring motorcycles—his beasts of the road! Why? To unleash a brand new wave of sonic destruction with As I Lay Dying! 🤘🔥
That’s right! The man’s takin’ drastic measures, sacrificing his two-wheeled thunder to pump cash into fresh riffs that’ll slap you right in the face! It’s like trading your gold for Bitcoin, only the stakes are a helluva lot louder and bloodier! 🏍️💰
Picture this: Tim, our battle-hardened warrior, tearing through the streets on his iron horses, wind in his hair, but instead, he’s cashing in those chrome-plated dreams to build a sonic onslaught that’ll have the metal gods headbanging in approval! The gritty vibe? Unmatched! Just like the crypto grind, it’s all about investing in the future of pure metal madness!
So, gear up and get ready to smash that play button when the new As I Lay Dying hits! Who needs bikes when you’re conjuring anthems that’ll set the mosh pits ablaze? Let’s unleash those riffs and ride the wave of this rebellious metal quest!⚡🤘
Stay heavy, stay savage! \m/ [Check out the full chaos here!](https://www.metalsucks.net/2025/10/10/tim-lambesis-sold-all-his-motorcycles-to-fund-new-as-i-lay-dying-music)
#ThrashMetal #Headbangers #MetalCulture #DeathMetal #Metalheads
